It looks like this could happen only if a local file exists with the same name 
as a remote folder. Is this the case?

Yes, that is true.  I had a local subfolder that was created locally and during 
this update if found the same directory was now in CVS.  There was nothing in 
my local directory and it seems to be working on now.  I didn't actually notice 
anything wrong, just though I would report the exception from the error log.
We should add tests for gender changes but not for 3.0

You probably didn't see the problem because it has been fixed > RC2.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 66007 ***
